verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Show us, more miracles, i-f yo-u are Messiah
Give us, free bread each day.
Just like, our father said, as
He jour-neyed through the wilderness
But this is, what Jesus had to say

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I am, I am the bread of life
You will never grow hungry
I am your water, drink and never thirst again
I am, I am your father; Child, I know you by name
I am, and I'll never change

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's the Alpha, and Omega
The beginning, and the end
He'is the same, as He wa-s back then
And just like, He raised the dead
And caused the blind to see
He'-ll work mira-cles, if we'll just believe.
